Agility chest
Type: Container

A brown leather boot that fell down right next to you while you were exercising, though nobody seemed to be around. Upon closer inspection, there seems to be something hidden in there.

Agility chest is an openable treasury item. It can drop while doing Agility activities, and can be obtained from some other sources. These Chests are the only way to obtain some Agility based Equipment. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.
